derivation: or (by transposition) אוֹרְנָה; or אַרְנִיָּהlemma אַנִיָּה missing resh, corrected to אַרְנִיָּה; all by orthographical variation for H771 (אׇרְנָן);
outline:
Araunah = "I shall shout for joy"
  1. class='lex2'>= "make ye to shine (2 Sam. 24:16)"
  2. class='lex2'>= "joyful shouting of Jah (2 Sam. 24:18)"
  • a Jebusite who sold David the site for an altar
strongs_def: Aravnah (or Arnijah or Ornah), a Jebusite
